Special Powers
RALLY (6): Opposing Attack Rolls . Steal Energy. // When Blade would be KO'd by an opposing character, you may instead remove one of Blade's RALLY dice. If you do, turn him to click #6. Protected: Pulse Wave.

June 19, 2022
Squabbler
Your opponent wants to roll a 6. You want them to roll a 6, because every 6 they roll means this dude has another STOP click. He is almost always the last character on your force standing. Add to that his final Click is Flurry + Steal Energy? Pssh, there's almost never any reason to use that Regeneration. This dude is a monster, especially if the dice are in your favor.

Goop
The fact that you can have multiple rally die on a figure makes Blade here kinda scary. Over the course of a game you could get 3 or 4 rally die sitting on him and then he just WONT DIE. He can be extremely frustrating for your opponents to deal with.
